title: I want to be Dyed in Your Colors
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Look, look, Karin-san! This sandal is so cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It really is! Sport sandals seem to be the trend this year<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>There are so many of them that you don’t know which one to pick huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>We might want a sacoche bag too to go along with the sport sandals….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>If it’s just a sacoche bag can’t we make it ourselves?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s a good idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hey, what if we make it according to each other’s image? I want to try creating a sacoche bag that fits you, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then, I’ll make one that fits your image, Kotori-chan. After that, let’s wear each other’s bag and do a fashion show♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hmm…. If so, then I’d like to coordinate your entire outfit instead! I’ll pick everything that suits you, Karin-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, being dyed in your colors doesn’t sound so bad, Kotori-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
